root.title: Data Compressed - PowerShell
root.description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network.
root.author: Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled

falsepositives.item: Highly likely if archive operations are done via PowerShell.
